stories!"},{"lineNumber":161152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、待ってダーリン、忘れ物」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait, darling, you forgot something.\""},{"lineNumber":161153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行ってらっしゃいのチュー。","translatedEnglishLine":"A goodbye kiss."},{"lineNumber":161154,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んーーー……","translatedEnglishLine":"Mmmmmm..."},{"lineNumber":161155,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おとと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops\""},{"lineNumber":161156,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぷちゅーっとリアがランスのほっぺにキスをした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria gave Lance a little peck on the cheek."},{"lineNumber":161157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe~\""},{"lineNumber":161158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まったく、これから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Good grief, carefree.\""},{"lineNumber":161160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、待って待って、もう一つあるのダーリン、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait wait, there's one more thing, darling,"},{"lineNumber":161161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出発する前に護衛つけてあげるね」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll assign you a bodyguard before you depart.\""},{"lineNumber":161162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらに」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Over here.\""},{"lineNumber":161163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes...!\""},{"lineNumber":161164,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリスが親衛隊の方に目配せをすると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Maris signaled to the royal guards,"},{"lineNumber":161165,"originalJapaneseLine":"金の鎧の中から異質の白の鎧を身につけた","translatedEnglishLine":"from among the golden armor appeared a distinct figure clad in white armor—"},{"lineNumber":161166,"originalJapaneseLine":"美麗な女騎士が姿を現した。","translatedEnglishLine":"a beautiful female knight emerged."},{"lineNumber":161167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、可愛いぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, she's cute."},{"lineNumber":161168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Who are you?\""},{"lineNumber":161169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初めまして、ランス総統閣下。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nice to meet you, Supreme Commander Lance."},{"lineNumber":161170,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はハウレーン・プロヴァンス。","translatedEnglishLine":"I am Howleen Provence."},{"lineNumber":161171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　白の軍で副将をしています」","translatedEnglishLine":"I serve as the deputy general of the White Army.\""},{"lineNumber":161172,"originalJapaneseLine":"（この男がランス、か……","translatedEnglishLine":"(So this man is Lance..."},{"lineNumber":161173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なるほど……確かに噂に違わぬ人物のようだ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I see... he truly is a man who lives up to the rumors...)"},{"lineNumber":161174,"originalJapaneseLine":"（悪い噂ゆえ、そうあって欲しくはなかったが……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Although since the rumors were bad, I hoped that wouldn't be the case...)"},{"lineNumber":161175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この子の部隊、護衛につけてあげるね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll assign her unit to be your escort.\""},{"lineNumber":161176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当はリアがダーリンについていきたいけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, Ria wants to accompany you, darling,"},{"lineNumber":161177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすがにそれは出来ないし……","translatedEnglishLine":"but, as expected, she can't..."},{"lineNumber":161178,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なら、代わりに親衛隊をと思ったけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I thought of assigning the royal guard instead..."},{"lineNumber":161179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア様……それはさすがに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Ria... that's a bit too much...\""},

{"lineNumber":161180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってレイラも言うし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Layla said that too."},

{"lineNumber":161181,"originalJapaneseLine":"　代わりにリーザスにいる間は","translatedEnglishLine":"Instead, while you're in Riesz,"},

{"lineNumber":161182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウレーンの部隊貸してあげるね」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll lend you Howleen's unit.\""},{"lineNumber":161183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほう、この子の部隊をか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hoho, her unit, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":161184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「道中、私の部隊が命に代えても","translatedEnglishLine":"\"On the road, my unit will, even at the risk of their lives,"},{"lineNumber":161185,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必ずや魔人討伐隊を守ります」","translatedEnglishLine":"definitely protect the demon-slaying troops.\""},{"lineNumber":161186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、頼もしいではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, that's reassuring."},{"lineNumber":161187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But...\""},{"lineNumber":161188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「騎士よりもメイドでもして","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rather than a knight, I'd prefer she acted as a maid,"},{"lineNumber":161189,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お世話をして欲しいところだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"to take care of me.\""},{"lineNumber":161190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":161191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　怒ったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Are you angry?\""},{"lineNumber":161192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ、女扱いされるのは慣れています」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, I'm used to being treated like a woman.\""},{"lineNumber":161193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「父が父なので七光り扱いされることも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because of my father, I am also sometimes seen as riding his coattails.\""},{"lineNumber":161194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「父……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Father...?\""},{"lineNumber":161195,"originalJapaneseLine":"（サーナキアちゃんみたいに","translatedEnglishLine":"(I thought if I got angry like Sarnakia-chan when treated like a woman,"},{"lineNumber":161196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女扱いするなーって怒ったら","translatedEnglishLine":"I could tease her...)"},{"lineNumber":161197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　からかってやろうと思ったのに）","translatedEnglishLine":"(But she just calmly responded.)"},{"lineNumber":161198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「騎士の身分に不釣り合いな女の体を嘲り、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those who mock my physique as unfit for a knight,"},{"lineNumber":161199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　親の七光りだろうと笑う者は……","translatedEnglishLine":"or laugh saying I owe everything to my father's name..."},{"lineNumber":161200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の剣の腕と、信念を貫く姿で黙らせてきた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have silenced them with my swordsmanship and unwavering conviction.\""},{"lineNumber":161201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統が私を女と見るなら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If the Supreme Commander sees me as a woman,"},{"lineNumber":161202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方にも認識を改めてもらえばいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"then you should revise your perception as well.\""},{"lineNumber":161203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それだけです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is all.\""},{"lineNumber":161204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ、そか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm, I see.\""},{"lineNumber":161205,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うーん、こりゃ典型的な堅物女騎士だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm, she's a classic stiff-upper-lip female knight."},{"lineNumber":161206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サーナキアちゃん以上、アミトス以下の堅さだ）","translatedEnglishLine":"She's more rigid than Sarnakia-chan but less so than Amitos.)"},{"lineNumber":161207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね、ね、ダーリン、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, darling,"},{"lineNumber":161208,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウレーンどう？　気に入った？」","translatedEnglishLine":"How do you like Howleen? Do you like her?\""},{"lineNumber":161209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、まあまあだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, she's alright.\""},{"lineNumber":161210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー、そうよね、そうよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe~ Yeah, right, right.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お土産話、楽しみにしてるね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm looking forward to the souvenirs stories!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、待ってダーリン、忘れ物」
「行ってらっしゃいのチュー。
んーーー……
「おとと」
ぷちゅーっとリアがランスのほっぺにキスをした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria gave Lance a little peck on the cheek.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへー」
「……まったく、これから
命賭けの戦いに出るってのに呑気な奴だぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you're heading into a life-risking battle but you're so carefree."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、待って待って、もう一つあるのダーリン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, wait wait, there's one more thing, darling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出発する前に護衛つけてあげるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll assign you a bodyguard before you depart."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらに」
マリスが親衛隊の方に目配せをすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Maris signaled to the royal guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金の鎧の中から異質の白の鎧を身につけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from among the golden armor appeared a distinct figure clad in white armor—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美麗な女騎士が姿を現した。
「おっ、可愛いぞ。
君は？」
「初めまして、ランス総統閣下。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nice to meet you, Supreme Commander Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はハウレーン・プロヴァンス。
白の軍で副将をしています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I serve as the deputy general of the White Army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この男がランス、か……
なるほど……確かに噂に違わぬ人物のようだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... he truly is a man who lives up to the rumors...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （悪い噂ゆえ、そうあって欲しくはなかったが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Although since the rumors were bad, I hoped that wouldn't be the case...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この子の部隊、護衛につけてあげるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll assign her unit to be your escort."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当はリアがダーリンについていきたいけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, Ria wants to accompany you, darling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがにそれは出来ないし……
なら、代わりに親衛隊をと思ったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I thought of assigning the royal guard instead...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様……それはさすがに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Ria... that's a bit too much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってレイラも言うし。
代わりにリーザスにいる間は
ハウレーンの部隊貸してあげるね」
「ほほう、この子の部隊をか……」
「道中、私の部隊が命に代えても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the road, my unit will, even at the risk of their lives,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずや魔人討伐隊を守ります」
「ふむ、頼もしいではないか。
だが……」
「騎士よりもメイドでもして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather than a knight, I'd prefer she acted as a maid,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お世話をして欲しいところだな」
「ん？　怒ったか？」
「……いえ、女扱いされるのは慣れています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, I'm used to being treated like a woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「父が父なので七光り扱いされることも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of my father, I am also sometimes seen as riding his coattails."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （サーナキアちゃんみたいに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I thought if I got angry like Sarnakia-chan when treated like a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女扱いするなーって怒ったら
からかってやろうと思ったのに）
「騎士の身分に不釣り合いな女の体を嘲り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who mock my physique as unfit for a knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親の七光りだろうと笑う者は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or laugh saying I owe everything to my father's name...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の剣の腕と、信念を貫く姿で黙らせてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have silenced them with my swordsmanship and unwavering conviction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統が私を女と見るなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If the Supreme Commander sees me as a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方にも認識を改めてもらえばいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then you should revise your perception as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それだけです」
「……うむ、そか」
（うーん、こりゃ典型的な堅物女騎士だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Hmm, she's a classic stiff-upper-lip female knight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアちゃん以上、アミトス以下の堅さだ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's more rigid than Sarnakia-chan but less so than Amitos.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、ね、ダーリン、
ハウレーンどう？　気に入った？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How do you like Howleen? Do you like her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、まあまあだな」
「えへへー、そうよね、そうよね。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

「行ってらっしゃいのチュー。

ぷちゅーっとリアがランスのほっぺにキスをした。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nice to meet you, Supreme Commander Lance.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Although since the rumors were bad, I hoped that wouldn't be the case...)

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll assign her unit to be your escort."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当はリアがダーリンについていきたいけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, Ria wants to accompany you, darling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがにそれは出来ないし……
なら、代わりに親衛隊をと思ったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I thought of assigning the royal guard instead...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様……それはさすがに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Ria... that's a bit too much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってレイラも言うし。
代わりにリーザスにいる間は
ハウレーンの部隊貸してあげるね」
「ほほう、この子の部隊をか……」
「道中、私の部隊が命に代えても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the road, my unit will, even at the risk of their lives,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずや魔人討伐隊を守ります」
「ふむ、頼もしいではないか。
だが……」
「騎士よりもメイドでもして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather than a knight, I'd prefer she acted as a maid,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お世話をして欲しいところだな」
「ん？　怒ったか？」
「……いえ、女扱いされるのは慣れています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, I'm used to being treated like a woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「父が父なので七光り扱いされることも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of my father, I am also sometimes seen as riding his coattails."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （サーナキアちゃんみたいに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I thought if I got angry like Sarnakia-chan when treated like a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女扱いするなーって怒ったら
からかってやろうと思ったのに）
「騎士の身分に不釣り合いな女の体を嘲り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who mock my physique as unfit for a knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親の七光りだろうと笑う者は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or laugh saying I owe everything to my father's name...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の剣の腕と、信念を貫く姿で黙らせてきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have silenced them with my swordsmanship and unwavering conviction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統が私を女と見るなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If the Supreme Commander sees me as a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方にも認識を改めてもらえばいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then you should revise your perception as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それだけです」
「……うむ、そか」
（うーん、こりゃ典型的な堅物女騎士だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Hmm, she's a classic stiff-upper-lip female knight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアちゃん以上、アミトス以下の堅さだ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's more rigid than Sarnakia-chan but less so than Amitos.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、ね、ダーリン、
ハウレーンどう？　気に入った？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How do you like Howleen? Do you like her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、まあまあだな」
「えへへー、そうよね、そうよね。
